name: Pangea Media
tag_list: quiz, quizzes, personality-test, poll, polls, lead-generation, lead-gen, market-research, survey, surveys, promotion, contest, challenge, coupon, sweepstakes
overview:
Pangea Media is the creator of SnapApp. The SnapApp marketing platform empowers brands, publishers and agencies to foster conversations across the web, social and mobile, that build brand affinity, connect, educate, entertain and drive sales. With the SnapApp platform companies can easily create engaging quizzes, surveys and contests and use these to drive measureable results including registrations, downloads, likes, follows,+1s, shares, subscriptions, time on site and ad revenue.

Companies and brands using SnapApp include: Martha Stewart, PCWorld, Harper Collins, Coldwell Banker, MTV, Clorox, Open Table, Comcast, NPR, Remington, and ABC Family, among others. Pangea Media is located in greater Boston and can be reached at 1-855-SNAP-APP or snapapp.com.

milestones.source_text:
BOSTON, BUSINESS WIRE -- Pangea Media, a leader in online quizzes and quiz technology, today announced the availability of the Quibblo Polls widget for the Apple iPhone and iPod Touch.

In growing numbers, people are finding that online quizzes, polls and surveys offer a fun and educational way to interact with websites and other users. Marketers are increasingly turning to these applications to engage consumers in new and meaningful ways, leading to valuable insights and more effective advertising. Now, with this news, Pangea Media is bringing the power of online quizzes, polls and surveys to the mobile world.

The Quibblo Polls widget is a location-aware quiz application that enables users to take polls and surveys on their iPhone and iPod Touch and then see consolidated results by geography. With the widget, users can participate in polls and then view results by city, state, country or overall. They can also see how others within a ten mile radius respond to the same survey. Using the Quibblo Polls widget, Pangea Media will be featuring a "poll of the day" with questions such as "Which City has the Best Chinese Food?" and "Paper or Plastic?" In addition, users can access additional Quibblo quizzes and content through their iPhones.

"Our Quibblo Polls widget provides iPhone and iPod Touch users with an engaging quiz application and the ability to see how their responses stack up against others--both within their areas and beyond," said Seth Lieberman, CEO of Pangea Media, "This is a great way to take advantage of the location capabilities of the new iPhone and we are excited about partnering with uLocate to bring this to market."

The Quibblo Polls widget is built on uLocate Communications' WHERE application for the iPhone and iPod Touch. Each of WHERE's location enabled widgets delivers content based on the user's current location and provides the ability to show this content on a map, get directions and share this location with friends.

"As we roll out the WHERE application for iPhone and iPod Touch, uLocate is thrilled to feature Quibblo within our suite of innovative widgets," said Dan Gilmartin, vice president of marketing, uLocate Communications. "Through the Quibblo widget, WHERE offers consumers an entertaining and insightful perspective on the world around them."

The Quibblo Polls Widget is available at no charge through iTunes as part of the WHERE application. For more information on the Quibblo Polls widget, visit: http://www.quibblo.com/promo/iphone.

About Quibblo.com

The ultimate online quiz experience, Quibblo offers users the opportunity to create and take quizzes, polls and surveys, and view the results. At Quibblo, users can create custom avatars, share comments, invite friends and post badges. In addition to Quibblo.com, users can access Quibblo through applications built for various social networking sites or embed the Quibblo widget in their personal website or blog.

About Pangea Media

Pangea Media is a casual entertainment and online advertising company that uses the power of quizzes to bring consumers and marketers together. Pangea operates a network of quiz sites including Quibblo.com and QuizRocket.com that enable users to share quiz-based content within the Pangea network and through other social media channels. Pangea Media is located in Watertown, MA and can be reached at 1-617-923-0000 or pangeamedia.com.
